Compliance description: Assess whether the code includes techniques to detect and mitigate model biases against specific groups.
Verify if the code uses SHAP, LIME, or feature importance scores to explain model predictions.
Check if the code incorporates tools like SHAP, LIME, or attention mechanisms to explain model decisions.
Verify if the code includes methods such as Bayesian inference or dropout-based uncertainty estimation.
Check if the code includes mechanisms to detect and flag unexpected predictions.
Ensure the code maintains logs of predictions, failures, and user feedback for debugging.
